metadata.Title: CVE-2020-36558 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: A race condition in the Linux kernel before 5.5.7 involving VT_RESIZEX could lead to a NULL pointer dereference and general protection fault.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
